_source.productName: Daniel Muggleton - You May Be White, I May Be Crazy - Bundaberg
_source.productDescription:
Daniel Muggleton is an Australian comedian in a red tracksuit. 

Daniel's stand-up shows frequently sell-out at comedy festivals around the world, in addition to receiving numerous five star reviews and awards. 

He's been hand-picked to support Jim Jefferies, Steve Hofstetter and Russell Kane on tour and clips of his jokes frequently go viral on social media having amassed over 25 million views.
_source.productShortDescription: Daniel Muggleton is an Australian comedian in a red tracksuit.

productComments.commentText:
Daniel Muggleton is an Australian comedian in a red tracksuit. 

Daniel's stand-up shows frequently sell-out at comedy festivals around the world, in addition to receiving numerous five star reviews and awards. 

He's been hand-picked to support Jim Jefferies, Steve Hofstetter and Russell Kane on tour and clips of his jokes frequently go viral on social media having amassed over 25 million views.

Daniel Muggleton ist ein australischer Komiker im roten Trainingsanzug.

Daniels Stand-up-Shows sind bei Comedy-Festivals weltweit regelmäßig ausverkauft und erhalten zahlreiche Fünf-Sterne-Kritiken und Auszeichnungen.

Er wurde persönlich ausgewählt, um Jim Jefferies, Steve Hofstetter und Russell Kane auf Tourneen zu unterstützen, und Clips seiner Witze gehen in den sozialen Medien regelmäßig viral und haben über 25 Millionen Aufrufe.

丹尼尔·马格尔顿是一位身着红色运动服的澳大利亚喜剧演员。

丹尼尔的单口喜剧表演经常在世界各地的喜剧节上座无虚席，并获得了无数五星好评和奖项。

他被精心挑选为吉姆·杰弗里斯、史蒂夫·霍夫施泰特和拉塞尔·凯恩的巡演助阵嘉宾，他的笑话片段经常在社交媒体上疯传，观看次数已超过2500万次。

Daniel Muggleton è un comico australiano in tuta rossa.

I suoi spettacoli di stand-up comedy registrano spesso il tutto esaurito nei festival di tutto il mondo, oltre a ricevere numerose recensioni a cinque stelle e premi.

È stato scelto personalmente per supportare Jim Jefferies, Steve Hofstetter e Russell Kane in tournée e le clip delle sue battute diventano spesso virali sui social media, avendo accumulato oltre 25 milioni di visualizzazioni.

Daniel Muggleton é um comediante australiano que veste um agasalho vermelho.

Os shows de stand-up de Daniel frequentemente esgotam os ingressos em festivais de comédia ao redor do mundo, além de receber inúmeras críticas e prêmios cinco estrelas.

Ele foi escolhido a dedo para apoiar Jim Jefferies, Steve Hofstetter e Russell Kane em turnês, e clipes de suas piadas frequentemente viralizam nas redes sociais, acumulando mais de 25 milhões de visualizações.

Daniel Muggleton est un humoriste australien en survêtement rouge.

Les spectacles de Daniel affichent souvent complet dans les festivals d'humour du monde entier et reçoivent de nombreuses critiques et récompenses.

Il a été sélectionné pour assurer la première partie de Jim Jefferies, Steve Hofstetter et Russell Kane en tournée, et ses blagues deviennent fréquemment virales sur les réseaux sociaux, cumulant plus de 25 millions de vues.

Daniel Muggleton es un comediante australiano con chándal rojo.

Sus monólogos suelen agotar las entradas en festivales de comedia de todo el mundo, además de recibir numerosas críticas de cinco estrellas y premios.

Ha sido seleccionado para acompañar a Jim Jefferies, Steve Hofstetter y Russell Kane en sus giras, y sus chistes se viralizan en redes sociales, acumulando más de 25 millones de visualizaciones.

다니엘 머글턴은 빨간 트레이닝복을 입은 호주 출신 코미디언입니다.

다니엘의 스탠드업 코미디 쇼는 전 세계 코미디 페스티벌에서 매진을 기록하는 경우가 많으며 수많은 5성급 리뷰와 상을 수상했습니다.

그는 짐 제프리스 스티브 호프스테터 러셀 케인의 투어를 지원하도록 엄선되었으며 그의 농담 영상은 소셜 미디어에서 2,500만 회 이상의 조회수를 기록하며 자주 화제가 되고 있습니다.

ダニエル・マグルトンは、赤いトラックスーツを着たオーストラリア出身のコメディアンです。

ダニエルのスタンドアップショーは、世界中のコメディフェスティバルで頻繁に完売し、数々の5つ星レビューと賞を受賞しています。

彼は、ジム・ジェフェリーズ、スティーブ・ホフステッター、ラッセル・ケインのツアーで前座に抜擢され、彼のジョーク動画はソーシャルメディアで頻繁に拡散され、再生回数は2,500万回を超えています。

Daniel Muggleton adalah seorang komedian Australia yang mengenakan setelan olahraga merah.

Pertunjukan stand-up Daniel seringkali terjual habis di festival-festival komedi di seluruh dunia, selain menerima banyak ulasan dan penghargaan bintang lima.

Ia telah dipilih secara khusus untuk mendukung Jim Jefferies, Steve Hofstetter, dan Russell Kane dalam tur mereka, dan cuplikan leluconnya seringkali menjadi viral di media sosial setelah ditonton lebih dari 25 juta kali.

丹尼爾·馬格爾頓是一位身穿紅色運動服的澳洲喜劇演員。

丹尼爾的單口喜劇表演經常在世界各地的喜劇節上座無虛席，並獲得了無數五星級好評和獎項。

他被精心挑選為吉姆·傑弗里斯、史蒂夫·霍夫施泰特和拉塞爾·凱恩的巡迴助陣嘉賓，他的笑話片段經常在社交媒體上瘋傳，觀看次數已超過2500萬次。

_source.productName: Wicked: For Good - Friends for Good Previews at Dendy Cinemas Coorparoo
_source.productDescription:
Enjoy a Wickedly Good cocktail on arrival!

Come see the Wicked final chapter first with the Friends for Good Preview Screening of Wicked: For Good. With a drink on arrival, experience the Land of Oz like never before as Glinda and Elphaba's friendship is pitted against the world.

Set years after Wicked, the adored Good Witch of the North and the feared Wicked Witch of the West must grow accustomed to their new and sudden changes in life and face the consequences of their actions with heart, brains and courage.
_source.productShortDescription: Come see the Wicked final chapter first with the Friends for Good Preview Screening of Wicked.

productComments.commentText:
Enjoy a Wickedly Good cocktail on arrival!

Come see the Wicked final chapter first with the Friends for Good Preview Screening of Wicked: For Good. With a drink on arrival, experience the Land of Oz like never before as Glinda and Elphaba's friendship is pitted against the world.

Set years after Wicked, the adored Good Witch of the North and the feared Wicked Witch of the West must grow accustomed to their new and sudden changes in life and face the consequences of their actions with heart, brains and courage.

Gustatevi un cocktail Wickedly Good all'arrivo!

Venite a vedere in anteprima il capitolo finale di Wicked con l'anteprima di Friends for Good di Wicked: For Good. Con un drink all'arrivo, immergetevi nella Terra di Oz come mai prima d'ora, mentre l'amicizia tra Glinda ed Elphaba si scontra con il mondo.

Ambientato anni dopo Wicked, l'adorata Strega Buona del Nord e la temuta Strega Cattiva dell'Ovest devono abituarsi ai nuovi e improvvisi cambiamenti della loro vita e affrontare le conseguenze delle loro azioni con cuore, cervello e coraggio.

Genießen Sie bei Ihrer Ankunft einen Wickedly Good Cocktail!

Sehen Sie sich zuerst das letzte Kapitel von Wicked an – mit der Friends for Good Preview von Wicked: For Good. Erleben Sie bei einem Drink bei Ihrer Ankunft das Land Oz wie nie zuvor, während Glindas und Elphabas Freundschaft auf die Probe gestellt wird.

Jahre nach Wicked müssen sich die verehrte Gute Hexe des Nordens und die gefürchtete Böse Hexe des Westens an ihre neuen und plötzlichen Veränderungen im Leben gewöhnen und den Konsequenzen ihres Handelns mit Herz, Verstand und Mut begegnen.

抵达后，享用一杯美味无比的“邪恶女巫”鸡尾酒！

快来观看《魔法坏女巫》最终章，并观看《魔法坏女巫：永远的朋友》预映。抵达后，享用一杯饮品，体验前所未有的奥兹国之旅，感受格林达和埃尔法巴的友谊与世界的对抗。

故事发生在《魔法坏女巫》之后的数年，受人爱戴的北方善良女巫和令人恐惧的西方邪恶女巫必须适应生活中突如其来的变化，并用心灵、智慧和勇气面对她们行为的后果。

Nikmati koktail Wickedly Good saat kedatangan!

Mari saksikan bab terakhir Wicked terlebih dahulu dengan Pemutaran Perdana Friends for Good untuk Wicked: For Good. Dengan segelas minuman saat kedatangan, rasakan Negeri Oz yang belum pernah ada sebelumnya saat persahabatan Glinda dan Elphaba dipertaruhkan oleh dunia.

Berlatar beberapa tahun setelah Wicked, Penyihir Baik dari Utara yang dipuja dan Penyihir Jahat dari Barat yang ditakuti harus terbiasa dengan perubahan hidup mereka yang baru dan tiba-tiba serta menghadapi konsekuensi tindakan mereka dengan sepenuh hati, otak, dan keberanian.

Desfrute de um coquetel Wickedly Good na chegada!

Venha conferir o capítulo final de Wicked em primeira mão com a pré-estreia de Wicked: For Good, da Friends for Good. Com um drinque na chegada, vivencie a Terra de Oz como nunca antes, enquanto a amizade de Glinda e Elphaba é colocada em confronto com o mundo.

Anos depois de Wicked, a adorada Bruxa Boa do Norte e a temida Bruxa Má do Oeste precisam se acostumar com as novas e repentinas mudanças em suas vidas e enfrentar as consequências de suas ações com coração, inteligência e coragem.

Savourez un cocktail délicieusement bon à votre arrivée !

Découvrez le dernier chapitre de Wicked en avant-première avec l'avant-première de Wicked : For Good. Avec un verre à votre arrivée, découvrez le Pays d'Oz comme jamais auparavant, alors que l'amitié de Glinda et Elphaba se mesure au monde.

Des années après Wicked, la bien-aimée Bonne Sorcière du Nord et la redoutable Méchante Sorcière de l'Ouest doivent s'habituer aux changements soudains de leur vie et affronter les conséquences de leurs actes avec courage, intelligence et courage.

ご到着後、Wickedly Goodのカクテルをお楽しみください！

Friends for Good主催の『Wicked: For Good』プレビュー上映で、Wickedの最終章をいち早くご覧ください。ご到着後、一杯のドリンクを片手に、かつてないほどオズの国を体感してください。グリンダとエルファバの友情が、世界と対峙する物語です。

『Wicked』から数年後を舞台に、愛される北の良い魔女と恐れられる西の悪い魔女は、突然の人生の変化に慣れ、心と知恵と勇気をもって、自らの行動の結果に立ち向かわなければなりません。

¡Disfruta de un cóctel Wickeds Good al llegar!

Ven a ver primero el capítulo final de Wicked con el preestreno de Amigos para Siempre de Wicked: Para Siempre. Con una bebida al llegar, vive la Tierra de Oz como nunca antes mientras la amistad de Glinda y Elphaba se enfrenta al mundo.

Ambientada años después de Wicked, la adorada Bruja Buena del Norte y la temida Bruja Mala del Oeste deben adaptarse a los nuevos y repentinos cambios en sus vidas y afrontar las consecuencias de sus actos con corazón, inteligencia y valentía.

도착하시면 위키드 칵테일을 즐겨보세요!

위키드: 포 굿의 프렌즈 포 굿 미리보기 상영과 함께 위키드 마지막 장을 먼저 감상하세요. 도착 시 음료를 즐기며 글린다와 엘파바의 우정이 세상과 맞서 싸우는 오즈의 나라를 전에 없던 새로운 방식으로 경험해 보세요.

위키드가 개봉된 지 수년이 지난 후 사랑받는 북쪽의 착한 마녀와 두려움의 대상 서쪽의 사악한 마녀는 새롭고 갑작스러운 삶의 변화에 적응하고 마음과 머리 그리고 용기를 가지고 그들의 행동의 결과에 맞서야 합니다.

抵達後，享用一杯美味無比的「邪惡女巫」雞尾酒！

來觀賞《魔法壞女巫》最終章，並觀賞《魔法壞女巫：永遠的朋友》預覽。抵達後，享用一杯飲品，體驗前所未有的奧茲國之旅，感受格林達和埃爾法巴的友誼與世界的對抗。

故事發生在《魔法壞女巫》之後的數年，受人愛戴的北方善良女巫和令人恐懼的西方邪惡女巫必須適應生活中突如其來的變化，並用心靈、智慧和勇氣面對她們行為的後果。

_source.productName: 4ZZZ Dykes on Mykes: Broadcasting Live from Queensland Museum Kurilpa
_source.productDescription:
Be in the audience for this special edition of 4ZZZ Community Radio's Dykes on Mykes, broadcasting live from the Squid Lounge at Queensland Museum Kurilpa. 

This iconic radio show team has been invited to reflect on the program's long history, with a particular focus on the 90s to coincide with the museum's latest free exhibition - Make A Scene: Fashioning Queer Identity and Club Culture in the 90s. 

This special live broadcast will feature Queensland Museum curators. Make A Scene: Fashioning Queer Identity and Club Culture in the 90s will be open late. 

Enjoy exclusive access to the museum after-hours in celebration of 4ZZZ's 50th Anniversary and Make a Scene. This after-hours event is recommended for audiences aged 18 plus.
_source.productShortDescription: Be in the audience for this special edition of 4ZZZ Community Radio's Dykes on Mykes, broadcasting live from the Squid Lounge at Queensland Museum Kurilpa.

accessibilityAttributes.attributeSubType1IdDescription: Actively welcomes people with access needs.

attributes.attributeIdDescription: Offer multiple options for booking - web, email, phone
Offer a range of contact methods for receiving complaints
Accept the Companion Card
Employ people with disability
Train your staff in disability awareness
Have accessibility information and photos, including of a bathroom, room and/or floor plan on your website (can be emailed on request)
Ask all visitors if there are any specific needs to be met
Website meets WCAG 2.0 accessibility standards

attributeBlocks.attributeSubType2IdDescription: Welcomes and assists people who have challenges with learning, communication, understanding and behaviour. (includes people with autism, intellectual disability, Down syndrome, acquired brain injury (ABI), dyslexia and dementia)

attributes.attributeIdDescription: Train your staff in communicating with people with learning or behavioural challenges
Use Plain English / easy read signage and information (includes menus and emergency information)
A quiet space is available at the venue/ facility

attributeBlocks.attributeSubType2IdDescription: Caters for people who are blind or have vision loss.

attributes.attributeIdDescription: Provide information in large print
Provide digital communication materials (hard copy information is also available on line)
Use easy read fonts in your signage and communication materials (Helvetica and Arial)
Train your staff  in customer service for people with vision loss (training would incorporate way finding and communicating with people with vision loss)
Have raised tactile buttons in your lifts
Have handrails on all your stairways
Have Exit signs which are visible at a ground level (high level signs are difficult to see in a fire)

attributeBlocks.attributeSubType2IdDescription: Caters for people who are deaf or have hearing loss.

attributes.attributeIdDescription: Have a hearing loop
Train your staff in communicating with people who are deaf or have hearing loss
Staff are trained in Auslan
Have TVs with captioning option
Have visual alerts for emergencies (Include flashing light)
Have a low noise reception areas with hearing loss friendly acoustics and adequate lighting for viewing facial expressions (includes common areas which are free of background noise, background music)

attributeBlocks.attributeSubType2IdDescription: Caters for people who use a wheelchair.

attributes.attributeIdDescription: Have step free outdoor pathways (includes picnic areas, barbecues and shelters)
Have a step free main entrance to the building and/or reception area (includes ramps or slopes with a maximum gradient of 1:14, otherwise are too steep for wheelchairs)
Have step free access to restaurant, lounge and bar
Have lifts with enough space for people using a mobility aid to enter and turn around to use the lift buttons. Buttons are at accessible height.
Have an accessible public toilet which is unlocked
Have a wheelchair accessible toilet / shower and change room
Have at least one wheelchair accessible parking space with wheelchair accessible signage clearly displayed (International standards are 3200mm wide x 2500 mm high)

attributeBlocks.attributeSubType2IdDescription: Caters for people with sufficient mobility to climb a few steps but who would benefit from fixtures to aid balance. (This includes people using walking frames and mobility aids)

attributes.attributeIdDescription: Provide seating in common areas including reception area

attributeBlocks.attributeSubType2IdDescription: Caters for people with allergies and intolerances.

attributes.attributeIdDescription: Train your staff to respond to allergic reactions
Adhere to The Food Authority requirements for allergy management in food preparation

productComments.commentText:
Be in the audience for this special edition of 4ZZZ Community Radio's Dykes on Mykes, broadcasting live from the Squid Lounge at Queensland Museum Kurilpa. 

This iconic radio show team has been invited to reflect on the program's long history, with a particular focus on the 90s to coincide with the museum's latest free exhibition - Make A Scene: Fashioning Queer Identity and Club Culture in the 90s. 

This special live broadcast will feature Queensland Museum curators. Make A Scene: Fashioning Queer Identity and Club Culture in the 90s will be open late. 

Enjoy exclusive access to the museum after-hours in celebration of 4ZZZ's 50th Anniversary and Make a Scene. This after-hours event is recommended for audiences aged 18 plus.

Saksikan edisi spesial Dykes on Mykes dari Radio Komunitas 4ZZZ, yang disiarkan langsung dari Squid Lounge di Museum Queensland Kurilpa.

Tim acara radio ikonis ini diundang untuk merenungkan sejarah panjang program ini, dengan fokus khusus pada era 90-an bertepatan dengan pameran gratis terbaru museum - Make A Scene: Fashioning Queer Identity and Club Culture in the 90s.

Siaran langsung spesial ini akan menampilkan kurator Museum Queensland. Make A Scene: Fashioning Queer Identity and Club Culture in the 90s akan dibuka hingga larut malam.

Nikmati akses eksklusif ke museum setelah jam operasional dalam rangka perayaan Hari Jadi ke-50 4ZZZ dan Make a Scene. Acara setelah jam operasional ini direkomendasikan untuk penonton berusia 18 tahun ke atas.

퀸즐랜드 박물관 쿠릴파(Queensland Museum Kurilpa)의 스퀴드 라운지(Squid Lounge)에서 생중계되는 4ZZZ 커뮤니티 라디오(4ZZZ Community Radio)의 '다이크스 온 마이크스(Dykes on Mykes)' 특별 방송을 시청하세요.

이 상징적인 라디오 쇼 팀은 박물관의 최신 무료 전시 '메이크 어 씬: 90년대의 퀴어 정체성과 클럽 문화 만들기(Make A Scene: Fashioning Queer Identity and Club Culture in the 90s)'와 함께 90년대에 초점을 맞춰 프로그램의 오랜 역사를 되돌아보는 시간을 갖도록 초대되었습니다.

이 특별 생방송에는 퀸즐랜드 박물관 큐레이터들이 참여합니다. '메이크 어 씬: 90년대의 퀴어 정체성과 클럽 문화 만들기'는 심야까지 운영됩니다.

4ZZZ 50주년과 '메이크 어 씬'을 기념하여 박물관 운영 시간 외에 특별 입장 혜택을 누리세요. 이 운영 시간 외 행사는 만 18세 이상 관람객에게 권장됩니다.

欢迎您亲临现场，收听4ZZZ社区电台的特别节目《Dykes on Mykes》，节目将在昆士兰博物馆库里尔帕分馆的Squid Lounge进行现场直播。

这档标志性的电台节目团队受邀回顾节目的悠久历史，并特别聚焦于90年代，以配合博物馆最新的免费展览——“Make A Scene: Fashioning Queer Identity and Club Culture in the 90s”（打造场景：塑造90年代的酷儿身份与俱乐部文化）。

本次特别直播节目将邀请昆士兰博物馆的策展人参与。“Make A Scene: Fashioning Queer Identity and Club Culture in the 90s”展览将延长开放时间。

为庆祝4ZZZ电台成立50周年以及“Make A Scene”展览，您可在闭馆后独家参观博物馆。本次闭馆后活动建议18岁及以上人士参加。

Ne manquez pas cette édition spéciale de « Dykes on Mykes », l'émission de radio communautaire de 4ZZZ, diffusée en direct du Squid Lounge du Queensland Museum Kurilpa.

L'équipe emblématique de cette émission a été invitée à revenir sur la longue histoire du programme, en particulier sur les années 90 à l'occasion de la nouvelle exposition gratuite du musée : « Make A Scene : Fashioning Queer Identity and Club Culture in the 90s ».

Cette émission spéciale en direct accueillera les conservateurs du Queensland Museum. L'exposition « Make A Scene : Fashioning Queer Identity and Club Culture in the 90s » sera ouverte tard dans la nuit.

Profitez d'un accès exclusif au musée après sa fermeture pour célébrer le 50e anniversaire de 4ZZZ et l'exposition « Make a Scene ». Cet événement est recommandé aux personnes de 18 ans et plus.

4ZZZコミュニティラジオの特別版「Dykes on Mykes」をぜひお聴きください。クイーンズランド博物館クリルパのスクイッドラウンジから生放送されます。

この人気ラジオ番組制作チームは、博物館の最新無料企画展「Make A Scene：90年代のクィア・アイデンティティとクラブカルチャーの創造」に合わせて、番組の長い歴史、特に90年代に焦点を当てて振り返ります。

この特別生放送には、クイーンズランド博物館のキュレーターが出演します。「Make A Scene：90年代のクィア・アイデンティティとクラブカルチャーの創造」展は夜遅くまで開館しています。

4ZZZ開館50周年と「Make a Scene」を記念して、博物館の営業時間外への特別アクセスをお楽しみください。この営業時間外のイベントは18歳以上の方におすすめです。

Acompáñanos en esta edición especial de Dykes on Mykes de 4ZZZ Community Radio, transmitida en vivo desde el Squid Lounge del Museo de Queensland en Kurilpa.

El icónico equipo del programa de radio ha sido invitado a reflexionar sobre su larga trayectoria, con especial énfasis en la década de los 90, coincidiendo con la inauguración de la nueva exposición gratuita del museo: Make A Scene: Fashioning Queer Identity and Club Culture in the 90s (Creando una escena: La construcción de la identidad queer y la cultura de club en los 90).

Esta transmisión especial en vivo contará con la participación de los curadores del Museo de Queensland. Make A Scene: Fashioning Queer Identity and Club Culture in the 90s (Creando una escena: La construcción de la identidad queer y la cultura de club en los 90) permanecerá abierta hasta tarde.

Disfruta de acceso exclusivo al museo fuera del horario habitual para celebrar el 50.º aniversario de 4ZZZ y la exposición Make A Scene. Este evento nocturno está recomendado para mayores de 18 años.

Siate tra il pubblico di questa edizione speciale di Dykes on Mykes di 4ZZZ Community Radio, trasmessa in diretta dallo Squid Lounge del Queensland Museum Kurilpa.

Questo iconico team radiofonico è stato invitato a riflettere sulla lunga storia del programma, con particolare attenzione agli anni '90, in concomitanza con l'ultima mostra gratuita del museo: Make A Scene: Fashioning Queer Identity and Club Culture in the 90s.

Questa speciale trasmissione in diretta vedrà la partecipazione dei curatori del Queensland Museum. Make A Scene: Fashioning Queer Identity and Club Culture in the 90s sarà aperta fino a tardi.

Godetevi l'accesso esclusivo al museo dopo l'orario di chiusura per celebrare il 50° anniversario di 4ZZZ e Make a Scene. Questo evento dopo l'orario di chiusura è consigliato a un pubblico dai 18 anni in su.

Seien Sie dabei bei dieser Sonderausgabe von „Dykes on Mykes“ des Community-Radiosenders 4ZZZ, live aus der Squid Lounge des Queensland Museum Kurilpa.

Das legendäre Radioteam blickt auf die lange Geschichte der Sendung zurück, mit besonderem Fokus auf die 90er-Jahre, passend zur aktuellen Gratis-Ausstellung des Museums: „Make A Scene: Queere Identität und Clubkultur der 90er“.

In dieser Live-Sondersendung sind auch Kuratoren des Queensland Museums zu Gast. Die Ausstellung „Make A Scene: Queere Identität und Clubkultur der 90er“ hat bis spät abends geöffnet.

Genießen Sie exklusiven Zugang zum Museum nach den regulären Öffnungszeiten anlässlich des 50-jährigen Jubiläums von 4ZZZ und der Ausstellung „Make A Scene“. Diese Veranstaltung ist für Besucher ab 18 Jahren geeignet.

歡迎您親臨現場，收聽4ZZZ社區電台的特別節目《Dykes on Mykes》，節目將在昆士蘭博物館庫裡爾帕分館的Squid Lounge進行現場直播。

這檔標誌性的電台節目團隊受邀回顧節目的悠久歷史，並特別聚焦於90年代，以配合博物館最新的免費展覽－「Make A Scene: Fashioning Queer Identity and Club Culture in the 90s」（打造場景：塑造90年代的酷兒身分與俱樂部文化）。

本次特別直播節目將邀請昆士蘭博物館的策展人參與。 「Make A Scene: Fashioning Queer Identity and Club Culture in the 90s」展覽將延長開放時間。

為慶祝4ZZZ電台成立50週年以及“Make A Scene”展覽，您可在閉館後獨家參觀博物館。本次休館後活動建議18歲以上人士參加。

Assista à edição especial do programa Dykes on Mykes, da rádio comunitária 4ZZZ, transmitida ao vivo do Squid Lounge no Museu de Queensland Kurilpa.

A icônica equipe do programa foi convidada a refletir sobre sua longa história, com foco especial nos anos 90, coincidindo com a mais recente exposição gratuita do museu: Make A Scene: Fashioning Queer Identity and Club Culture in the 90s (Crie uma Cena: Moldando a Identidade Queer e a Cultura Club nos Anos 90).

Esta transmissão ao vivo especial contará com a presença dos curadores do Museu de Queensland. A exposição Make A Scene: Fashioning Queer Identity and Club Culture in the 90s ficará aberta até mais tarde.

Aproveite o acesso exclusivo ao museu após o horário de funcionamento, em comemoração ao 50º aniversário da 4ZZZ e à exposição Make a Scene. Este evento noturno é recomendado para maiores de 18 anos.

productSiteAddressRelationship.addressLine1: Corner of Grey and Melbourne Streets

_source.productName: Loose Wallum Watercolour Workshop with Libby Derham
_source.productDescription:
Join award-winning artist Libby Derham for a relaxing and mindful morning of watercolours.

Be inspired by local Wallum, studying beautiful banksias and more. Learn techniques to loosen up your watercolour painting and explore ink and mixed media layers. Get up close and personal with the local flora as you learn to capture their essence on paper.

Participants will utilise professional quality paints and materials ensuring vibrant and lasting artwork. Discover the joy of connecting with nature through art and create your own unique visual record of the Sunshine Coast's native plant life.

All materials provided. Suitable for all skill levels. Complimentary tea/coffee will be provided.

Please wear suitable art-making clothes or bring an apron.
_source.productShortDescription: Join award-winning artist Libby Derham for a relaxing and mindful morning of watercolours.

productComments.commentText:
Join award-winning artist Libby Derham for a relaxing and mindful morning of watercolours.

Be inspired by local Wallum, studying beautiful banksias and more. Learn techniques to loosen up your watercolour painting and explore ink and mixed media layers. Get up close and personal with the local flora as you learn to capture their essence on paper.

Participants will utilise professional quality paints and materials ensuring vibrant and lasting artwork. Discover the joy of connecting with nature through art and create your own unique visual record of the Sunshine Coast's native plant life.

All materials provided. Suitable for all skill levels. Complimentary tea/coffee will be provided.

Please wear suitable art-making clothes or bring an apron.

Unisciti alla pluripremiata artista Libby Derham per una mattinata rilassante e consapevole all'insegna degli acquerelli.

Lasciati ispirare dalla Wallum locale, studiando le splendide banksie e molto altro. Impara tecniche per dare più slancio alla tua pittura ad acquerello ed esplora strati di inchiostro e tecniche miste. Avvicinati alla flora locale e impara a catturarne l'essenza su carta.

I partecipanti utilizzeranno colori e materiali di qualità professionale per garantire opere d'arte vibranti e durature. Scopri la gioia di entrare in contatto con la natura attraverso l'arte e crea la tua testimonianza visiva unica della flora autoctona della Sunshine Coast.

Tutti i materiali sono forniti. Adatto a tutti i livelli. Tè/caffè gratuiti.

Si prega di indossare abiti adatti all'arte o di portare un grembiule.

Bergabunglah dengan seniman pemenang penghargaan Libby Derham untuk pagi yang santai dan penuh kesadaran dengan cat air.

Dapatkan inspirasi dari Wallum setempat, pelajari keindahan bunga banksia, dan banyak lagi. Pelajari teknik untuk membuat lukisan cat air Anda lebih rileks dan jelajahi lapisan tinta dan media campuran. Dekati flora lokal sambil belajar menangkap esensinya di atas kertas.

Peserta akan menggunakan cat dan material berkualitas profesional untuk menghasilkan karya seni yang hidup dan tahan lama. Temukan kegembiraan terhubung dengan alam melalui seni dan ciptakan rekaman visual unik Anda sendiri tentang kehidupan tanaman asli Sunshine Coast.

Semua material disediakan. Cocok untuk semua tingkat keahlian. Teh/kopi gratis akan disediakan.

Harap kenakan pakaian berkarya seni yang sesuai atau bawalah celemek.

Verbringen Sie mit der preisgekrönten Künstlerin Libby Derham einen entspannten und achtsamen Vormittag mit Aquarellmalerei.

Lassen Sie sich vom lokalen Wallum inspirieren und bewundern Sie wunderschöne Banksias und mehr. Lernen Sie Techniken, um Ihre Aquarellmalerei aufzulockern, und erkunden Sie Tusche- und Mischtechnik-Schichten. Lernen Sie die lokale Flora hautnah kennen und lernen Sie, ihre Essenz auf Papier festzuhalten.

Die Teilnehmer verwenden hochwertige Farben und Materialien für lebendige und langlebige Kunstwerke. Entdecken Sie die Freude an der Verbindung mit der Natur durch Kunst und schaffen Sie Ihre eigene, einzigartige visuelle Darstellung der einheimischen Pflanzenwelt der Sunshine Coast.

Alle Materialien werden gestellt. Für alle Schwierigkeitsgrade geeignet. Kostenloser Tee/Kaffee wird bereitgestellt.

Bitte tragen Sie geeignete Kunstkleidung oder bringen Sie eine Schürze mit.

Junte-se à premiada artista Libby Derham para uma manhã relaxante e consciente de aquarelas.

Inspire-se com as Wallum locais, estudando as belas banksias e muito mais. Aprenda técnicas para soltar sua pintura em aquarela e explore camadas de tinta e técnicas mistas. Aproxime-se da flora local enquanto aprende a capturar sua essência no papel.

Os participantes utilizarão tintas e materiais de qualidade profissional, garantindo obras de arte vibrantes e duradouras. Descubra a alegria de se conectar com a natureza por meio da arte e crie seu próprio registro visual único da flora nativa da Sunshine Coast.

Todos os materiais são fornecidos. Adequado para todos os níveis de habilidade. Chá/café de cortesia serão fornecidos.

Use roupas adequadas para a prática artística ou traga um avental.

Únete a la galardonada artista Libby Derham para disfrutar de una mañana relajante y consciente de acuarela.

Inspírate con las flores locales de Wallum, estudiando las hermosas banksias y mucho más. Aprende técnicas para relajarte en tus acuarelas y explora las capas de tinta y técnicas mixtas. Acércate a la flora local mientras aprendes a capturar su esencia en el papel.

Los participantes utilizarán pinturas y materiales de calidad profesional que garantizan obras de arte vibrantes y duraderas. Descubre la alegría de conectar con la naturaleza a través del arte y crea tu propio registro visual único de la flora autóctona de Sunshine Coast.

Todos los materiales están incluidos. Apto para todos los niveles. Se ofrecerá té y café de cortesía.

Por favor, usa ropa adecuada para la creación artística o trae un delantal.

受賞歴のあるアーティスト、リビー・ダーハム氏と一緒に、ゆったりと心安らぐ水彩画の朝を過ごしましょう。

地元のワラムや美しいバンクシアなどからインスピレーションを得ながら、水彩画を楽しみましょう。水彩画をリラックスして描くテクニックを学び、インクやミクストメディアの層を探求しましょう。地元の植物を間近で観察し、そのエッセンスを紙に描き出す方法を学びましょう。

参加者はプロ仕様の絵の具と画材を使用し、鮮やかで長持ちする作品を制作します。アートを通して自然とつながる喜びを体験し、サンシャインコーストに生息する植物たちを、あなただけの特別なビジュアルで記録しましょう。

画材はすべてご用意いたします。スキルレベルは問いません。無料の紅茶／コーヒーもご用意しております。

制作に適した服装でご参加いただくか、エプロンをご持参ください。

수상 경력에 빛나는 예술가 리비 더럼과 함께 편안하고 마음 챙김이 가득한 수채화 아침을 보내세요.

아름다운 뱅크시아를 연구하며 현지 월럼에서 영감을 얻어보세요. 수채화에 대한 부담을 줄이고 잉크와 혼합 재료의 레이어를 활용하는 기법을 배우세요. 종이에 그 본질을 담아내는 법을 배우며 현지 식물을 가까이에서 만나보세요.

참가자들은 전문가급 물감과 재료를 사용하여 생동감 넘치고 오래 지속되는 예술 작품을 완성합니다. 예술을 통해 자연과 교감하는 기쁨을 발견하고 선샤인 코스트의 토종 식물을 자신만의 독특한 시각 자료로 기록해 보세요.

모든 재료는 제공되며 모든 수준의 참여가 가능합니다. 무료 차/커피가 제공됩니다.

미술 활동에 적합한 옷을 입거나 앞치마를 지참해 주세요.

與屢獲殊榮的藝術家 Libby Derham 一起，享受一個輕鬆愜意的水彩早晨。

從當地沃勒姆 (Wallum) 的植物中汲取靈感，研究美麗的山龍眼等植物。學習放鬆水彩畫的技巧，探索水墨和混合媒材的層次。近距離接觸當地植物，學習如何在紙上捕捉它們的精髓。

參與者將使用專業品質的顏料和材料，確保作品生動逼真、歷久不衰。探索透過藝術與自然連結的樂趣，創作屬於您自己獨特的陽光海岸原生植物的視覺記錄。

所有資料均已提供。適合所有技能水平。我們將提供免費茶/咖啡。

請穿著合適的藝術創作服裝或攜帶圍裙。

与屡获殊荣的艺术家 Libby Derham 一起，享受一个轻松惬意的水彩早晨。

从当地沃勒姆 (Wallum) 的植物中汲取灵感，研究美丽的山龙眼等植物。学习放松水彩画的技巧，探索水墨和混合媒介的层次。近距离接触当地植物，学习如何在纸上捕捉它们的精髓。

参与者将使用专业品质的颜料和材料，确保作品生动逼真、经久不衰。探索通过艺术与自然连接起来的乐趣，创作属于您自己独特的阳光海岸本土植物的视觉记录。

所有材料均已提供。适合所有技能水平。我们将提供免费茶/咖啡。

请穿着合适的艺术创作服装或携带围裙。

Rejoignez l'artiste primée Libby Derham pour une matinée d'aquarelle relaxante et pleine de conscience.

Laissez-vous inspirer par les Wallums locaux, en étudiant les magnifiques banksias et bien plus encore. Apprenez des techniques pour assouplir votre aquarelle et explorez les couches d'encre et de techniques mixtes. Approchez-vous de la flore locale et apprenez à capturer son essence sur papier.

Les participants utiliseront des peintures et du matériel de qualité professionnelle pour des œuvres vibrantes et durables. Découvrez le plaisir de se connecter à la nature par l'art et créez votre propre témoignage visuel unique de la flore indigène de la Sunshine Coast.

Tout le matériel est fourni. Convient à tous les niveaux. Thé/café offert.

Veuillez porter une tenue adaptée à la création artistique ou apporter un tablier.

rates.rateComment: All materials provided. Suitable for all skill levels. Complimentary tea/coffee will be provided.

_source.productName: Wicked: For Good - Friends for Good Previews at Dendy Cinemas Portside
_source.productDescription:
Enjoy a Wickedly Good cocktail on arrival!

Come see the Wicked final chapter first with our Friends for Good Preview Screening of Wicked: For Good. With a drink on arrival, experience the Land of Oz like never before as Glinda and Elphaba's friendship is pitted against the world.

Set years after Wicked, the adored Good Witch of the North and the feared Wicked Witch of the West must grow accustomed to their new and sudden changes in life and face the consequences of their actions with heart, brains and courage.

productComments.commentText:
Enjoy a Wickedly Good cocktail on arrival!

Come see the Wicked final chapter first with our Friends for Good Preview Screening of Wicked: For Good. With a drink on arrival, experience the Land of Oz like never before as Glinda and Elphaba's friendship is pitted against the world.

Set years after Wicked, the adored Good Witch of the North and the feared Wicked Witch of the West must grow accustomed to their new and sudden changes in life and face the consequences of their actions with heart, brains and courage.

Genießen Sie bei Ihrer Ankunft einen Wickedly Good Cocktail!

Sehen Sie sich zuerst das letzte Kapitel von Wicked an – mit unserer Friends for Good Preview von Wicked: For Good. Erleben Sie bei einem Drink bei Ihrer Ankunft das Land Oz wie nie zuvor, während Glindas und Elphabas Freundschaft auf die Probe gestellt wird.

Jahre nach Wicked müssen sich die verehrte Gute Hexe des Nordens und die gefürchtete Böse Hexe des Westens an ihre neuen und plötzlichen Veränderungen im Leben gewöhnen und den Konsequenzen ihres Handelns mit Herz, Verstand und Mut begegnen.

抵达后，享用一杯美味无比的“邪恶女巫”鸡尾酒！

快来观看我们《魔法坏女巫：为了好》的预映，抢先体验《魔法坏女巫》最终章吧！抵达后，享用一杯饮品，体验前所未有的奥兹国之旅，感受格林达和埃尔法巴的友谊与世界的对抗。

故事发生在《魔法坏女巫》之后的数年，受人爱戴的北方善良女巫和令人恐惧的西方邪恶女巫必须适应生活中突如其来的变化，并用心灵、智慧和勇气面对她们行为的后果。

Gustatevi un cocktail Wickedly Good all'arrivo!

Venite a vedere in anteprima il capitolo finale di Wicked con la nostra proiezione in anteprima di Wicked: For Good, Friends for Good. Con un drink all'arrivo, immergetevi nella Terra di Oz come mai prima d'ora, mentre l'amicizia tra Glinda ed Elphaba si scontra con il mondo.

Ambientato anni dopo Wicked, l'adorata Strega Buona del Nord e la temuta Strega Cattiva dell'Ovest devono abituarsi ai nuovi e improvvisi cambiamenti della loro vita e affrontare le conseguenze delle loro azioni con cuore, cervello e coraggio.

¡Disfruta de un cóctel Wickeds Good al llegar!

Ven a ver primero el capítulo final de Wicked con nuestro preestreno de "Friends for Good" de Wicked: For Good. Con una bebida al llegar, vive la Tierra de Oz como nunca antes mientras la amistad de Glinda y Elphaba se enfrenta al mundo.

Ambientada años después de Wicked, la adorada Bruja Buena del Norte y la temida Bruja Mala del Oeste deben adaptarse a los nuevos y repentinos cambios en sus vidas y afrontar las consecuencias de sus actos con corazón, inteligencia y valentía.

도착하시면 위키드 칵테일을 즐겨보세요!

위키드: 포 굿의 프렌즈 포 굿 미리보기 상영과 함께 위키드 마지막 장을 먼저 감상하세요. 도착 시 음료를 즐기며 글린다와 엘파바의 우정이 세상과 맞서 싸우는 오즈의 나라를 전에 없던 새로운 방식으로 경험해 보세요.

위키드가 개봉된 지 수년이 지난 후 사랑받는 북쪽의 착한 마녀와 두려움의 대상 서쪽의 사악한 마녀는 새롭고 갑작스러운 삶의 변화에 적응하고 마음과 머리 그리고 용기를 가지고 그들의 행동의 결과에 맞서야 합니다.

Desfrute de um coquetel Wickedly Good na chegada!

Venha conferir o capítulo final de Wicked em primeira mão com nossa prévia de Wicked: For Good, com a participação de Amigos para o Bem. Com um drinque na chegada, vivencie a Terra de Oz como nunca antes, enquanto a amizade de Glinda e Elphaba é colocada em confronto com o mundo.

Anos depois de Wicked, a adorada Bruxa Boa do Norte e a temida Bruxa Má do Oeste precisam se acostumar com as novas e repentinas mudanças em suas vidas e enfrentar as consequências de suas ações com coração, inteligência e coragem.

Nikmati koktail Wickedly Good saat kedatangan!

Mari saksikan bab terakhir Wicked terlebih dahulu dengan Pemutaran Perdana Friends for Good untuk Wicked: For Good. Dengan segelas minuman saat kedatangan, rasakan pengalaman Negeri Oz yang belum pernah ada sebelumnya saat persahabatan Glinda dan Elphaba dipertaruhkan oleh dunia.

Berlatar beberapa tahun setelah Wicked, Penyihir Baik dari Utara yang dipuja dan Penyihir Jahat dari Barat yang ditakuti harus terbiasa dengan perubahan hidup mereka yang baru dan tiba-tiba serta menghadapi konsekuensi tindakan mereka dengan sepenuh hati, otak, dan keberanian.

ご到着後、Wickedly Goodのカクテルをお楽しみください！

Friends for Good主催の『Wicked: For Good』プレビュー上映で、Wickedの最終章をいち早くご覧ください。ご到着後、一杯のドリンクを片手に、かつてないほどオズの国を体感してください。グリンダとエルファバの友情が、世界と対峙する物語です。

『Wicked』から数年後を舞台に、愛される北の良い魔女と恐れられる西の悪い魔女は、突然の人生の変化に慣れ、心と知恵と勇気をもって、自らの行動の結果に立ち向かわなければなりません。

抵達後，享用一杯美味無比的「邪惡女巫」雞尾酒！

快來觀看我們《魔法壞女巫：為了好》的預映，搶先體驗《魔法壞女巫》最終章吧！抵達後，享用一杯飲品，體驗前所未有的奧茲國之旅，感受格林達和埃爾法巴的友誼與世界的對抗。

故事發生在《魔法壞女巫》之後的數年，受人愛戴的北方善良女巫和令人恐懼的西方邪惡女巫必須適應生活中突如其來的變化，並用心靈、智慧和勇氣面對她們行為的後果。

Savourez un cocktail délicieusement bon à votre arrivée !

Découvrez le dernier chapitre de Wicked en avant-première avec l'avant-première de Wicked : For Good « Amis pour de bon ». Avec un verre à votre arrivée, découvrez le Pays d'Oz comme jamais auparavant, alors que l'amitié de Glinda et Elphaba est mise à rude épreuve.

Des années après Wicked, la bien-aimée Bonne Sorcière du Nord et la redoutable Méchante Sorcière de l'Ouest doivent s'habituer aux changements soudains de leur vie et affronter les conséquences de leurs actes avec courage, intelligence et courage.
